product highlights

Enzymatic Oral Hygiene Chews reduce plaque and tartar helping keep teeth clean and breath fresh, even on days when brushing isn't possible. Available in Petite, Medium, Large and Extra-Large sizes.

    This product is intended for intermittent or supplemental feeding only. Give your dog one chew daily to help reduce plaque and tartar.

product_name: ARM & HAMMER™ Advanced Pet Care Tarter Control Enzymatic Dog Toothpaste
product_description:
product highlights

Whiten and brighten your dog's teeth with Arm & Hammer Advanced Pet Care Tartar Control Enzymatic Toothpaste. Powerful enzymes break down and help prevent tartar buildup, while baking soda deeply cleans and deodorizes your dog's teeth, gums and mouth. Let your canine companion flash a bright, white smile with Arm & Hammer Advanced Care Tartar Control Toothpaste for Dogs.

Features: Enzymes help fight tartar, Taste dogs love
Includes: (1) 2.5 oz Toothpaste
Toothpaste Flavor: Beef Flavor
Intended For: Dogs
Health Consideration: Tartar Control
Caution: Avoid eye contact. Keep out of reach of children. Store at room temperature. Not intended for human use.

Instructions:
For first time brushers, put a small amount of toothpaste on your finger and invite the dog to lick it off. Slowly progress to rubbing your finger along the gum line and teeth. Then, put a small amount of toothpaste on the toothbrush or finger brush and repeat. Always make this a positive experience for your dog. For best result, brush 2-3 times per week.

Sorbitol, Water, Hydrated Silica, Calcium Carbonate, Polysorbate 20, Tetrasodium Pyrophosphate, Cellulose Gum, Sodium Bicarbonate, Zinc Gluconate, Proteases, Thymol

Total Weight: 2 fl oz

Simply apply two drops of Clean Teeth Gel to each side of your dog's mouth. product_description:
product highlights

The Sentry Calming Pheromone Dog Collar has calming pheromones that help soothe dogs in fearful or stressful situations.     Cautions: Remove the collar before shampooing your dog and replace it after the dog's coat is dry. Do not use collar on dogs with skin lesions. SENTRY Calming Collar for Dogs is not a pharmaceutical product. For animal use only.

    Directions: Take the collar out of the packaging and stretch to full length. The tabs that held the collar in place should fall off when stretching; pull on any remaining tabs to remove them. Bend the buckle in half between the holes in the buckle, so that you can easily pass the end of the collar through both holes. Place the collar around your pet's neck. Feed the collar through both holes, notches facing out. Fit to the neck of the dog. The collar must be worm loosely to allow for growth of the pet and to permit the collar to move about the neck. Generally, a properly fitted collar is one that, when fastened, will snugly slide over pet's head, and two fingers can be placed between the collar and pet's neck. Leave 2 or 3 extra inches for collar adjustment, cut off remaining excess collar and dispose of in the trash. Wash hands after placing collar on pet. Seal collar in plastic bag when not in use to prolong effectiveness.

In acute cases (those with sudden onset), the doses can be given every 15 minutes, up to 4 doses. For cases that are not acute (chronic, long term problems), one dose 3 times daily.

If reduction causes symptoms to worsen, original dosing may be continued a little longer before reducing. If a remedy is working well and dosing is not reduced, an aggravation of symptoms from overuse may occur. In acute cases (those with sudden onset), the doses can be given every 15 minutes, up to 4 doses. For cases that are not acute (chronic, long term problems), one dose 3 times daily.

For Pet Crates attach on a clean dry surface close to air holes but out of reach of the pet, the outside surface of the crate is best for locating the patch and patch protector. On standard e-collars place the gel patch and patch protector on the inside surface of the collar. If using in cars ensure patch and protector are placed out of reach of the pet but in an area that offers good circulation of air to the whole car.

product_name: Eye Envy Ultimate Tear Stain Removal Pet System
product_description:
product highlights

With Eye Envy, you can say goodbye to unsightly tear stains. This kit includes everything you need to keep your pet's eyes stain-free. This herbal version does not require refrigeration.

With the Eye Envy tear stain removal system, you can say goodbye to unsightly tear stains. Eye Envy removes tear stains by utilizing a combination of ingredients that attack the root of the problem: a bacteria infection. Eye Envy contains a cleanser, an astringent (to dry the area) and herbal flower extract (acts as a natural antibiotic) and an antibacterial agent. Externally applied, this safe, non-irritating and effective cleanser and beautifier removes unsightly stains and inhibits dark staining production. Safe enough for daily use. Eye Envy can be used for chin acne and urine stains.

This kit includes all the essential products needed for the cleansing and beautification process. No refrigeration required formula.

Includes:

  • 4 oz. Eye Envy NR Solution
  • Eye Envy Powder
  • Rayon application pads

Directions:
Begin with Eye Envy Solution:

1. If your pet's eyes are very crusty and full of debris, then gently clean around their eyes with warm water and a toothbrush (softly) or a small flea comb. Try to remove as much debris as possible. If eyes are mostly runny, with no big clumps of debris, then skip this step.*
2. Shake bottle of Eye Envy well and saturate a lint free cotton pad
3. Gently wipe around eye area. Don't be afraid to get it too wet. Do not pour solution into eyes, but don't worry if a little bit gets inside. Allow to dry.
4. Gently work the Eye Envy Powder into your dogs fur, working around the eyes and working powder against the hair growth. You can use a small brush, Q-Tip or your fingertip. Allow to dry. You can apply the powder immediately after applying the solution. Avoid powder in their nose.
5. You're DONE! Your dog's eyes should look great within a few hours. Continue this process for 1 straight week. After one week, apply as necessary.

*Note: Step 1 is for first time users and for animals that have extreme debris in their eyes. After the initial application, you will only need to do consider Steps 2-4.

Note: When initially removing stains, it is strongly recommended to use BOTH Eye Envy solution and powder. Together, you will receive the maximum results. This formula does not require refrigeration. Eye Envy does not contain any bleach, peroxide, steroids or other harmful agents and is topically applied. Under refrigerated and sealed conditions nominal shelf life is approximately 2-3 months.

product_name: Wisdom Panel Breed Identification Dog DNA Test
product_description:
product highlights

Dogs can't talk... but their DNA can! With just a simple cheek swab, Wisdom Panel 2.0 compares your dog's DNA to the genetic signatures of more than 200 breeds and varieties. Unlock the secrets hidden in your dog's DNA that may help you understand your dog's unique appearance, behaviors, and optimal wellness needs.

Features: Learn the genetic signatures of more than 200 breeds
Includes: 1 –Test Kit contains 2 DNA cheek swabs, instruction sheet, swab drying insert, prepaid shipping label
Intended For: Dogs
Health Consideration: Compare your dog's DNA
Dimensions: 1.625"D x 6.625"W x 9.625"H

How do I use my Wisdom Panel 2.0 kit to test my dog's DNA?
Testing is as easy as 1-2-3
1. Simply collect a sample from the inside of your dog's cheek with the included swabs.
2. Activate your test online at www.wisdompanel.com/start and mail the swabs back to our laboratory with the postage-paid shipping label.*
3. Within 3 weeks, you'll receive an e-mailed ancestry report with your dog's results. *Activation of test online will allow immediate tracking of your sample as well as updates throughout the process of the test analysis. Please be sure to complete all required fields.

How long does it take to get Wisdom Panel 2.0 results?
Once the sample has been received at the lab, it generally takes 2-3 weeks for the sample to be tested, results generated and report available for download on our website. You will receive email notification when the report is available for download.

product_name: PetAg PetLac Puppy Milk Replacement
product_description:
product highlights

Provide your puppy with the nutrients it needs to grow healthy and strong with PetLac Puppy Milk Replacement. This easy-to-digest product is the perfect food source for orphaned puppies, and is a ready-to-feed food supplement to help keep your puppy in good health.

Features: Ready to feed liquid; Easy to digest
Intended For: Puppies
Includes: 1 Box of puppy milk replacement
Total Weight: 32 fl oz (946 mL)

Storage:
Discard unused formula after 14 dys. Do not freeze in original container. May be frozen in single serving size containers.

Directions:
If possible all puppies should receive colostrum for nursing on their mother for the first several days. Weighing puppies at the beginning and every 3 days will help to determine the amount that should be used. Bottle-fed puppies should be fed 1 teaspoon (5 mL) per 4 ounces (115g) of body weight every 3-4 hours. Feeding amounts and frequency may vary according to individual needs. Smaller and weaker puppies may need increased feeding frequency. As puppies become older the feeding frequency may be decreased and the amount per feeding increased. At 4 to 6 weeks you may begin offering PetLac Puppy in a shallow bowl for the puppies to lap. Do not discontinue bottle feeding until the puppies are eating well on their own.

Weaned Puppies: Feed 2 tablespoons (30 mL) per 5 lb (2.2 kg) of body weight daily mixed in regular food.

Pregnant and lactating Females: Feed 2 tablespoons (30 m) per 5 lb (2.2 kg) of body weight daily mixed in regular food.

Consult your veterinarian for additional advice.

product_name: NaturVet® GrassSaver® Biscuits
product_description:
product highlights

NaturVet GrassSaver Biscuits contain healthy ingredients that help to diminish yellow spots on your lawn when fed to your dog on a daily basis. Stop yellow spots on your beautiful lawn! GrassSaver Biscuits are a healthy food supplement for dogs that contains ingredients such as B-Complex vitamins, amino acids and biotin to help prevent yellowing and killing of grass due to pet urine. Imagine how green your lawn can look. Simply feed GrassSaver Biscuits to your dog and rid your lawn of yellow spots.

How Does It Work?
The active ingredient in GrassSaver Biscuits, dl-Methionine, is an essential amino acid that plays a central role in mediating your dog's metabolism. This, in combination with B-Complex vitamins (Vitamin B1, pyridoxine and Vitamin B12), aid in the assimilation of food. GrassSaver also includes biotin, a water-soluble B vitamin that's essential for the proper utilization of the other B-complex vitamins. This synergistic combination of ingredients helps your dog to better metabolize nutrients thereby preventing yellow spots in your lawn.

Ingredients:
Wheat Flour, Water, Peanut Butter, dl-Methionine, Thiamine Mononitrate, Pyridoxine Hydrochloride (B-6), Biotin, Vitamin B-12 Supplement, Yucca Schidigera Extract, Rye Flour, Flaxseed, and Bran Flour.

product_name: Only Natural Pet® HW Protect Herbal Formula
product_description:
product highlights

Only Natural Pet HW Protect Herbal Formula offers an herbal alternative to the chemical heartworm prevention methods available, without the degree of side effects that have been documented with their use. Chemical heartworm preventatives work by continual administration of a low dose of insecticide to kill any developing microfilariae (microscopic sized baby worms). Herbal preventatives work in a similar fashion, using herbs instead of pesticides. NEITHER method kills adult heartworms, so regular testing for heartworm, at least every 6 months, is absolutely necessary regardless of what method you choose for prevention.

Features:

  • Pure herbal extract
  • No artificial colors or preservatives
  • Hairball control

    Intended For: Dogs
    Includes: 1 dropper bottle: 2 fl oz/59 ml
    Health Consideration: Heart Worm Prevention
    Pet Weight: All (excluding pregnant or nursing mothers, animals with kidney or liver disease, or those with seizure disorders)
    Total Weight: 2 oz (59 m)
    Dimensions: 2 fl oz (59 ml)br> 1.5 in x 1.5 in x 4 inches

    Cautions:
    An herbal approach to heartworm prevention is not like a traditional heartworm pharmaceutical preventative, which chemically kills all heartworm larvae, but it may be an effective and more natural method to prevent heartworm infection. Consistent dosing is essential for proper protection along with heartworm testing at least every 6 months.

    This formula is not for use in pregnant or nursing mothers, animals with kidney or liver disease, or those with seizure disorders.

    Directions:
    This tincture may be mixed with food, applied with dropper or syringe directly into mouth, or mixed with up to 1/2 cup of warm water.

    For Dogs and Cats - 3 times per day, give 1 drop for every 2 pounds of body weight up to 50 pounds, plus 1 drop for every 4 pounds of body weight over 50 pounds. For example, a 70-lb. dog would begiven 25 drops + 5 drops = 30 drops, three times each day (total 90 drops).

    Each 2 oz bottle contains approximately 1,050 drops, and each 4 oz bottle contains approximately 2,100 drops of the formula.
    May contain sediment. Refrigerate after opening. SHAKE WELL.

product_description:
product highlights

Your pet's health is important to you. Keep your pooch safe from common tapeworms, hookworms, roundworms and whipworms with Bayer Expert Care Quad Dewormer Chewable Tablets for Dogs. Because we know keeping your four legged companion healthy is something you strive to do every day.

Intended For: Dogs

Health Consideration: Anthelmintic, Dewormer
Use: Dewormer

Cautions: WARNING: KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN. SIDE EFFECTS: Isolated incident of either vomiting, bloody stool or watery/profuse stool have been reported following treatment. If these signs are observed and they persist, consult your veterinarian. Questions? For questions or to report a suspected side effect, call Bayer at 1-855-886-7971.

Directions:
DOSAGE AND ADMINISTRATION: Quad Dewormer Chewable Tablets for Dogs may be given directly in the mouth or offered in a small amount of food. You should weigh your dog to make sure you are using the right size and number of tablets. Administer to dogs and puppies* only as follows:

For Puppies and Small Dogs* (2 - 25 lbs.)
Body Wt. (lbs.) No. of Tablets
2 - 4 0.5
5 - 7 1.0
8 - 12 1.5
13 - 18 2.0
19 - 25 2.5

For Medium Dogs (26 - 60 lbs.)
Body Wt. (lbs.) No. of Tablets
26 - 30 1.0
31 - 44 1.5
45 - 60 2.0

For Large Dogs (45 lbs. and greater)
Body Wt. (lbs.) No. of Tablets
45 -60 1.0
61 - 90 1.5
91 - 120 2.0

*NOT FOR USE IN PUPPIES LESS THAN 3 WEEKS OF AGE OR DOGS WEIGHING LESS THAN 2 LBS.

FASTING IS NEITHER NECESSARY NOR RECOMMENDED.

RETREATMENT: Steps should be taken to control fleas and rodents on the premises in order to prevent reinfection; otherwise, retreatment will be necessary. This is especially true in cases of tapeworms transmitted by fleas (Dipylidium caninum) where reinfection is almost certain to occur if fleas are not removed from the animal and its environment. If reinfection occurs, tapeworm segments may be observed within one month of the initial treatment.

product_name: NaturVet® GrassSaver® Chew Tablets
product_description:
product highlights

This all natural supplement keeps your dog's urine from burning your lawn. Manufacturer offers a 100% money back guarantee.

Select items on clearance.

Stop yellow spots on your beautiful lawn! GrassSaver is a healthy food supplement for dogs that contains ingredients such as B-Complex vitamins, amino acids and biotin to help prevent yellowing and killing of grass due to pet urine. Imagine how green your lawn can look. Simply feed GrassSaver to your dog and rid your lawn of yellow spots. Available in liquid and tablet form.

How Does It Work?
The active ingredient in GrassSaver Supplements, dl-Methionine, is an essential amino acid that plays a central role in mediating your dog's metabolism. This, in combination with B-Complex vitamins (Vitamin B1, pyridoxine and Vitamin B12), aid in the assimilation of food. GrassSaver also includes biotin, a water-soluble B vitamin that's essential for the proper utilization of the other B-complex vitamins. This synergistic combination of ingredients helps your dog to better metabolize nutrients thereby preventing yellow spots in your lawn.

GrassSaver Liquid

Ingredients: Water, Maltodextrins, dl-Methionine, Thiamine Mononitrate, Beef Liver, Pyridoxine Hydrochloride (B-6), Xanthan Gum, Sodium Benzoate (preservative), Biotin, Vitamin B-12 Supplement, Yucca Schidigera Extract, and Natural Flavoring.

Guaranteed Analysis: Each teaspoon contains 130 mg. of dl-Methionine.

Directions:

  • Up to 19 lbs. - 1 teaspoon per day
  • 20 to 49 lbs. - 1 1/2 teaspoons per day
  • 50 to 79 lbs. - 2 teaspoons per day
  • 80 + lbs. - 2 1/2 teaspoons per day

Available in a 16 oz. bottle (contains approximately 96 teaspoons).
